original_title: Namal Rajapaksa named Presidential Candidate of SLPP
original_body_lines: The Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna (SLPP) today officially announces its National Organiser MP Namal Rajapaksa as the party’s Presidential Candidate.
The SLPP General Secretary, Sagara Kariyawasam announced this moments ago at the party’s headquarters in Nelum Mawatha.
